title: Artist's Palette Magazine Issue 128 (gnv64)
description:
Artist's Palette Magazine Issue 128
English | PDF | 84 Pages | 58.6 mb

FEATURES
32 Living Art	
Rebecca King explores the ancient tradition of Andean Textile art.
48 Christmas Buyers' Guide

INSIGHTS
18 Frances McMahon - The pursuit of perfection is a continual goal for this artist.
24 Vanessa Stockard - Colours and textures, feelings and concerns. All clamour for attention when this artist is creating her stunning works of art.
38 Owen Pointon - Discovering he had a skill for drawing and painting as a youngster, this artist has continually refined his skills, combining these with his love of the native wildlife of Australia.
54 Dalozzo Family - Mum Lucette, Dad Louis and daughter Judith Dalozzo are a talented trio.
70 Ted Simpson - This entertaining read explains the artist's enthusiasm and love for his world, of which art has a permanently important position.

DEMONSTRATIONS
28 Oils - Black Dog
It's interesting to watch the creative process as it unfolds, setting the stage for the black dog by Vanessa Stockard.
44 Acrylic - The Cassowary
Mission Beach in Far North Queensland supplied the stunning rainforest backdrop to this beautiful bird and her chicks by Owen Pointen.
64 Mixed Media - Apple Blossom Still Life
Exploring different techniques of paint application, such as using thick or thin paint, collage and different brush sizes were all used to create this floral still life by Judith Dalozzo.
76 Acrylic - Beach Rubble
The hardy stones from Maroochydore beach are the feature of this demonstration by Ted Simpson.

REGULARS
4 Editorial 
10 ArtBeat 
14 Woodlands Gallery 
74 What's On
